title: Daisy Lowe exudes gothic glamour in playsuit as she joins mother Pearl at Winter Wonderland event
text:
She has reportedly gone her separate ways from boyfriend Cameron McMeikan over their six year age difference.

But Daisy Lowe shrugged off the drama as she made a cheery appearance alongside mother Pearl at the Radley's Winter Wonderland event on Thursday.

The model, 30, and her lookalike designer mother, 49, went for matching gothic and glamorous looks as they posed up to celebrate their edit with the luxury handbag brand.

Duo: Daisy Lowe shrugged off the drama as she made a cheery appearance alongside mother Pearl at the Radley's Winter Wonderland event on Thursday

Daisy donned an elaborate sequin-embellished playsuit which featured cobweb-style lace across the bust, teasing her ample cleavage.

Boasting sparkling lace sleeves, the garment also drew the eye to the beauty's toned legs, with Daisy completing the look with biker boots.

Her raven tresses were styled sleek and straight while her pretty features were enhanced with feline flicks of liner and taupe lipstick.

Pearl matched her daughter's style vibe in an LBD with a shimmering tulle overlay paired with black ankle boots.

Daisy's outing comes after it was revealed she had split from Cameron McMeikan, 24, who she dated for almost a year before reportedly splitting over their six-year age gap.

The duo were first romantically linked when they were seen sharing a kiss during a low-key date in October last year.

A source told The Sun: 'They remain on good terms and Daisy is loving being single and hanging out with friends and family.

'She hasn't been on her own for ages and it feels like the right time.'

A source told The Mirror of their romance last year: 'It has been a while since Daisy had a serious boyfriend and she has grown really close to Cameron.

'They have been secretly dating for months and really enjoy each other's company.'

Daisy, whose dating history includes The Crown's Matt Smith, Hurts singer Theo Hutchcraft and Thomas Cohen, was previously romantically linked to artist John Leigh.
